Catalano.Imaging.Filters

Class Crop

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Filters.Crop

  • public class Crop
extends java.lang.Object
    Crop an image.
    The filter crops an image providing a new image, which contains only the specified rectangle of the original image.
